title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 347.15 - Reimbursement to the State
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 347.15 - Reimbursement to the State

State Regulations

Each social services district shall determine and pay to
the Department of Social Services, in accordance with section
347.13
of this Part, that share of
the support payments received on behalf of a family receiving ADC which
represents reimbursement to the State and Federal governments of amounts
contributed by them to assistance furnished such family, after deducting from
the Federal share any incentive payments which are retained or paid in
accordance with section
347.16
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
347.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
